BasicInfo.short: Kaizen Software Solutions is a software company that develops training, asset management, and vehicle management software for businesses.

Products.name: Vehicle Manager
Products.description: Vehicle Manager Software is a computerized vehicle log book which helps you track required and completed vehicle maintenance and more.

Products.name: Asset Manager (for Windows)
Products.description: Track your fixed assets with Asset Manager software. Check in and check out assets with a barcode scanner.

Products.name: Training Manager
Products.description: Track employee training records and status of training requirements with Training Manager software. Install in just a few minutes.

Products.name: Asset Manager (Web Edition)
Products.description: Track company assets with this web based asset tracking system. Check in or out items to personnel, track asset purchases, and more.
